titleStmt.title: The lamentable destruction of Mulheim, a Protestant towne in Germany Done by the inhabitants of Cologne the 30. of September last 1615. at three of the clock in the morning. Printed according to the Dutch originall.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld for Richard Lea, and are to bee sold at his shop at the North entry of the Royall Exchange, and in Paules Church yard by Edward Marchant,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the North entry of the Royall Exchange
